title: Beautifully Furnished Condo at the Coloradan!
posting_body: AMAZING VALUE Utilities & Internet INCLUDED with this GORGEOUSLY FURNISHED executive rental!
At The Coloradan NO VEHICLE NEEDED; Ride the light rail bring your suitcase and start enjoying the best location in Denver!
This home includes water, gas, electric and high-speed internet/wifi, basic housewares, linens, full window coverings and washer/dryer.
This comfy and elegantly designed space is the perfect place to settle in to Denver!

The top floor of the building features AMAZING amenities: outdoor heated pool, firepit, living area, full chef kitchen and outdoor grilles, a club house with billiards, shuffle board, televisions and views that will take your breath away!
This building has one of the few southern exposure rooftop pools with views for days and multiple outdoor community spaces!
You will be steps away from Denver’s transportation hub!
Union Station - light rail all over the city, AmTrack directly to ski in Winter Park via the Winter Park Express line, also ride direct to DIA.
Not to mention the convenience of Whole Foods, CVS, King Supers, and 100's of the hottest restaurants in the city within blocks!
Owner Pays Trash, Gas, Internet, Water, Sewer, Amenities, HOA Fees
** Specific lease terms and conditions are subject to owner’s approval prior to lease execution
Exclusively Listed by Meredith Loux with Colorado and Company Real Estate.
